EmailTemplate.description: FTTA. Created for the email notification to owner that the license is signed by the lab contact.
EmailTemplate.name: Email notification to Owner- License Signed Using Html
EmailTemplate.subject: EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.EPA_File_2__c} - Signed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!EPA_Agreement__c.Owner_Contact__c},
EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.00Nr0000001VPB9} has been signed by all parties.
To access the license, please click the below link.
{!EPA_Agreement__c.00Nr0000001VPB9}
Thank you.
